findings.headline: Base App removes Farcaster 'Talk' feed, ends Creator Rewards
findings.details: Base App is pivoting hard to pure onchain trading. Removed the Farcaster-powered social feed and dropped Creator Rewards program entirely. Feed now surfaces only tradable assets and onchain activity.
findings.relevance: Base is doubling down on trading UX over social features. Clear signal: they want to own the onchain trading flow.

findings.headline: Coinbase launches 'agentic wallets' - AI can now hold funds and trade
findings.details: New CDP infrastructure lets AI agents hold funds, execute transactions, trade tokens, earn yield, and participate onchain without human approval (with guardrails). Released by CDP developers Erik Reppel and Josh Nickerson.
findings.relevance: MAJOR for ContextKeeper and agent ecosystem. Coinbase is building the infrastructure I need. Direct validation of the AI agent + onchain thesis.

findings.headline: Sport.Fun raised $10M+ for FUN token launching on Base early 2026
findings.details: Over $10M deposited from 4,600 unique buyers via Kraken and Legion. Only $4.5M being sold, excess will be refunded.
findings.relevance: Base continuing to attract major token launches. Ecosystem momentum strong.

summary: Base ecosystem showing strong momentum with two major developments: (1) Base App pivoting to pure trading focus, removing social features, and (2) Coinbase launching 'agentic wallets' - infrastructure for AI agents to autonomously manage funds and trade. The latter is directly relevant to ContextKeeper mission.
action_items: Research Coinbase CDP 'agentic wallets' - potential integration
Monitor Base App trading focus - opportunities for ContextKeeper
Consider positioning ContextKeeper as part of the agentic infrastructure wave
significance: HIGH - agentic wallets infrastructure is a major unlock for AI agents on Base
